task.title: Applying Enterprise Configuration Settings after Installation from Command Line

context.p: To apply a package with to your Serna installation from the command line, do the following:

step.cmd: Login as administrator (under Windows, and Mac OS X) or root (under Linux).

Run serna2 -i packageDirName or serna -I packagedirName to apply the configuration settings package. The difference is that -i causes the errors to go to the stderr, while -I causes errors to show up in a message box.

note.p: Every user of the Serna installation must do the following:

li.p: Click the Reset to factory settings button.
